flawed_nl_solution:
After the first segment, there are 100 - 10 = <<100-10=60>>60 racers left in the race.
After the second segment, 60 / 3 = <<60/3=20>>20 racers are eliminated.
This leaves 60 - 20 = <<60-20=40>>40 racers to compete in the third segment.
After the third segment, 40 / 2 = <<40/2=20>>20 more racers are eliminated.
This leaves 40 - 20 = <<40-20=20>>20 racers to run in the final section of the race.
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 90, not 60. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
